10 CLSiB) 
20 V=l 
30 L=31 
40 R=31 
50 FOR H=L TO R 
60 IF V>23 THEN 130 
70 SET<H,V,1) 
80 NEXT H 
90 V=V+1 
100 L=L-1 
110 R=R+1 
120 GOT0 50 
130 READ U,D,L,R,C0 
140 IF U=-2 THEN 220 
150 V-U 
160 FOR H=L TO R 
170 SETCH,V,CO) 
1B0 NEXT H 
190 V=V+1 
200 IF V>D THEN 130 
23 GOTO 160 
220 RESTORE 
230 READ DUM 
240 IF DUMO-1 THEN 230 
250 Ca=RND(7)+l 
260 IF 00=1 THEN 250 
270 READ N,D,H,V 
280 IF H=-l THEN 220 
290 SET(H,V,CQ) 
300 SOUND N,D/16 
310 BOTD 250 
1000 DATA 24,31,30,32,2,26,31,11,17,8,29,29 
1010 DATA 11,17,4,27,31,15,15,4,27,31,22,27 
1020 DATA 6,27,31,24,24,7,29,29,22,27,7,29 
1030 DATA 29, 24, 24, 3, 27;31, 37, 51, 4, 29, 29 
1040 DATA 37,51,1,27,31,46,46,3,29,29,46 
1050 DATA 46,8,-2,-2,-2,-2,-2,-1 
1060 DATA 108,125,32,4,147,187,43,19,147 
1070 DATA 63,22,15,147,375,48,22,159,125 
1060 DATA 19,19,170,187,36,9,170,63,24 
1090 DATA 22,170,375,38,16,170,125,28,7 
110B DATA 1E«, 125, 31 ,13,170,125,31,19,176 
1H0 DATA 250,36,22,140,250,25,10,159,230 
1120 DATA 12.22,147,250,39,12,255,125,32 
1130 DATA 4,108,125,43,19,147,187,22,15,147 
1140 DATA 63,48,22,147,375,19,19,159,125,36 
1150 DATA 9,170,187,24,22,170,63,38,16,170 
1160 DATA 250,28,7,170,125,31,13,159,125,31 
1170 DATA 19.170,125,36,22,176,250,25,10,140 
1160 DATA 250,12,22,159,250,39,12,147,250,25 
1190 DATA 10,255,125,12,22,185,125,39,12 
1200 DATA 185,125,32,4,170,125,43,19,193 
1210 DATA 375,22,15,185,125,48,22,185,125 
1220 DATA 19,19,176,125,36,9,176,375,24,22
